summary:
removed decapitations, does not change any perks
compatible with everything
descriptionHtml:
Mod requested by daventry.

Installation:
Extract into the Skyrim/Data folder and make sure it is checked on the load order; that\'s it!

100% compatibility

Have a special mod request but don\'t know your way around the CK? Let me know, I might be able to help.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3381541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Check out my other mods![/url]
author: mrjentipede
